page.title: 17RUDDINGTON PEOPLE --DOCTOR
page.content: {Dr.A.H.Maclaren} is the senior doctor in the practice which has four doctors and two nurses.{Dr.Maclaren}trained in Aberdeen and at Nottingham General Hospital.He then went in the Air-force and came here in 1946. {Dr.Maclaren }would have liked to have been a surgeon but he has enjoyed being a family doctor.At first the surgery was in his own house with big racks of medicine in his room but now it is a {Medical Centre }caring for 7000 patients.There is a pharmicist in the {High Street}who makes up the presciptions. {Dr. Maclaren}thinks {Ruddington }is a healthy village but we could make it even better by not eating or drinking too much and taking regular exercise. In 1984 {Dr. Maclaren}was given the { {M.B.E. }for his services to medicine.
